titleStmt.title: The passion of Dido for Æneas As it is incomparably exprest in the fourth book of Virgil. Translated by Edmund Waller & Sidney Godolphin, Esqrs.
Aeneis. Book 4. English.
titleStmt.author: Virgil.
Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.
Godolphin, Sidney Godolphin, Earl of, 1645-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Peter Parker, at the Leg and Star over against the Royal Exchange in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: The translators names are in braces on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
